reviews_data.review_text: Just a great, quaint joint. Biker friendly. Always love stopping in for my Joe and chat!

We ordered Iced Vanila Latte & Iced Toasted Coconut Cold Brew. I liked coconut flavor inside of the coffee. The flavor was smoothly smudged. And the person who worked here was kind.
_ _ _

I visited today and tried the Hazelnut Crunch Latte with oatmilk. I liked it :) Also I got the sample bag($3.99) Crazy Puppy & Swiss Chocolate Almond bean for trying.
Great coffee, great people, cozy atmosphere. Highly recommend!

good Americano,good eats,good vibe check them out if you're in town
Lumpy
Southern Pines
Best coffeeshop in town.  I really enjoy seeing the guy that does handstands on the porch.

amazing small business run by the coolest owner in town !! vibes are always amazing for hanging out, studying, etc.. always a pleasure stopping in and the drinks are awesome ! was served by the best baristas last week,, one had curly black hair and one had brown hair and tall brown boots. such sweeties with the best customer service :)) will be back any chance i get !!
The coffee is great and the customer service is excellent!
THIS PLACE IS AMAZING! I love this place, for studying it's awesome, for takeout it's also awesome and the service I love it Definitely recommend for coffee lovers and drink lovers
Very good Coffee! Stardukin who lol

The coffee, service and ambience were all excellent.
They have outdoor and indoor (2 levels) seating.
They have baked products as well. I wish they had some vegan baked products as well

Great coffee. Usually get the daily brew . Always fresh. Tons of different beans you can buy by the LB. Solid menu of other coffee related items as well. Usually go on Sunday . I do have to ask, what is the deal with the dude that stays there for quite a while and stretches on the open porch. Kind of off putting TBH
Such good coffee!! Such a cute shop and smells so good!

Been in the coffee industry for 5 years, first time coming here. Service was super friendly yet also quick and efficient. The iced mocha was one of-if not the best-coffees I've had. The espresso was pulled perfectly. Will be back
Their cold brew was incredible! The service was quick and kind. They have both indoor and outdoor seating.  Come grab a coffee and enjoy their front porch.
Crossroads is great. They have the best prices of any coffee shop I know. Staff is very nice. Just wish they would put better seating upstairs. Other than that, love it!
cute little coffee shop in downtown waxhaw
Excellent day drankin spot. They have the best coffee around.
Great place!!
This place is lovely every time I stop by! The drinks and atmosphere are great and the people who work there are incredibly friendly :)
Quite honestly the best latte I have ever had! And the employees are so kind! I had the caramanilla thrilla with oat milk, SO GOOD

I lived in the area when this little place first opened and loved it from the start! I moved to NYC in 2011 but try to get through Waxhaw whenever I'm back in NC, I'm so happy that this little gem is still there!!
Best coffee house in Waxhaw!!

Nice coffee shop and great coffee.  Reminds me of a coffee shop we would visit in the Smokey Mountains.  Seating downstairs and upstairs.  Albeit upstairs feels like you're hanging out in a storage room.  We like to sit outside and watch the Waxhaw traffic go by.  Lots of parking around there. Lots of locals but coffee here. Lots of people study and read here. The smoothies are good too.
Super cozy coffee shop. Great atmosphere and the customer service is amazing. Definitely recommend.
This is really nice place
Got coffee from here, such a great experience and the coffee is next level !!!

Very good fresh coffee, nice friendly staff
I will be a returning customer and recommend it to family and friends

Had the most amazing Hazelnut Crunch Latte today! They have good selection of coffees, coffee beans and accessories. The baristas were very nice & helpful! My favorite part was the sign that says "Coffee! If you aren't shaking, you need another cup." That is totally my vibe! Fully caffeinated! Will be back!

This is a very cute coffee shop with lots of choices and good looking deserts. The staff were all extremely friendly and helpful. The drinks my wife and I got we thought were a little on the watery side (Chocolate mint latte and a drip coffee), but I'll probably come back in the summer to try a frappe if they have them.

Always a place I stop when I am  working in the area. It has such a nice atmosphere and great coffee. Usually a line but yesterday no wait. Weekends are usually crowded. The coffee is worth a bit of a wait. Prices have gone up since my last visit.

Good brew, friendly, helpful, and friendly staff.
Very good...... I would get a big black coffee from here again.

My wife and I always come here when we're visiting her family. The coffee is always great and the staff is welcoming and kind. Thank God they ship their coffee beans so we can enjoy their coffee the rest of the year up in New York!
Great vibes and friendly staff. Quality of the coffee leav w a bit to be desired, but it is otherwise wonderful! Also, pet friendly!
Cute and the coffee taste good.
Great vibe

I love this place!! The toasted coconut is my favorite! The staff is so friendly and helpful! The snacks are super yummy! I was very impressed to see they host AA and NA recovery meetings! So glad this community has such a great coffee shop!
I got the best chai of my life today. Was so scrumptious. Yaaas. U got to hit up the Rocking chairs
Very friendly staff and amazing coffee.
A fantastically warm and cozy place to kill time, do school, and hangout as the weather cools off. Atmosphere is warm and inviting, coffee is cheap. 10/10
Great coffee, as always. And wonderful service.

I'm new in town. Had been looking for a place to purchase Matcha (Im not a coffee drinker). Although they don't sell Matcha they make an awesome Chai Tea. Maddie, Syd, Meagan, and Iliana have the best customer service. They deserve a raise!!! =-) They greet you with a smile and great conversation. I love the atmosphere and prices are reasonable.
Pumpkin dirty chai

Great little coffee house!  It was our first time here in which we stopped at after leaving Cane Creek Park.  The coffee was good and very friendly service.  There is a small porch outside so we were able to sit with our dog.  Prices were very reasonable.  We'll be back next time we are in the area.
Nice selection of beans.
Try the expresso Milkshake trust me, you will fall in love.
Crossroads is definitely the best coffee around Marvin.
Fantastic coffee shop if you want somewhere that's not a chain with artisan coffee. Great atmosphere to hang out for a little and the drinks are delicious.
Good coffee

Great little coffee shop with a wide selection of coffee. The staff didn't offer any different coffee types and got one of our orders wrong. They were too busy chatting to each other to actually server us and other people correctly.

Very beailutiful and cozy little cafe in waxhawZ
Drove from charlotte one fine day to try their special of the day.
Great local roaster. Many varieties.  Ice coffee, cold brew, mochas Americano.  All have been delicious.

Incredible coffee shop here in Waxhaw. The staff is always smiling and enjoyable to be around. Great coffee, and there are several different locations to set yourself up at if you intend on staying. Yes, there's wifi.
Great Coffee and our favorite beans.  Darkside of the Bean!
been coming here for years and i love it! super cute and cozy!

This is the best place I've ever been to. The best customer service ever! When I walked in, they said hello to me, and asked what they could get for me?? They are so kind. Then they made my drink exactly how I asked for it and gave it to me?? I'm amazed at how kind the baristas are. The customer service is out of this world. Will definitely be coming to this place again.
Double espresso... Horrible... Basically quarter cup of brewed coffee.

Such friendly service, more than willing to answer question. I was impressed with the coffee selection you could buy and all the little, unique things inside. While you wait for your coffee, take a look around. There is outside seating that we enjoyed after we got our coffee. We were able to sit in the rocking chairs and talk out front, but there will be heavier traffic as it is close to the main road. Beware if you have trouble walking as there are uneven levels of terrain you have to walk on and then a few steps up to get inside.
Coffee was good and recommend the Oreo brownie. Lovely staff.

I cant believe i havent reviewed Crossroads yet.  My wife and i have sourced our beans from many places around Atlanta, and in our travels. Crossroads has the absolute best we have found thus far.  We intentionally go out of our way every few months to swing by for 1-2 lbs.

I cant recommend this place enough. Fantastic flavors. Massive variety. Excellent prices. And fast and friendly customer service.

Cons: Parking is always available, but it sucks due to location and traffic.  But not enough to lose a star. I'd rate this place a 4.8 to 4.9 stars in total.

Our personal favorite blend: "Chocolate Raspberry Truffle" and "Toasted Coconut"

Flavored blend to improve: "Blueberry Crumble"... it smells amazing. But the flavor is nearly absent.
It's a great little gem
Great coffee and baked goods!
Good stuff. Love the rustic old fashioned artsy vibe in the place. Not generic or standardized like Starbucks or Dunkin garbage. Wish more coffee  shops had this kind of unique character.
Delicious coffee and friendly staff. Pick your favorite beans to have ground and take home.

Coffee is usually pretty good and I like the feel of the place. I didn't want to give this place a bad review but it really does need to be addressed because it has consistently been an issue. One of the shifts the employees will not stop talking. The chatter is literally non-stop and it completely ruins the atmosphere and makes it difficult to study. I don't wanna sound picky, I don't mind talking but my goodness, it is *constant*.

I took an out-of-town friend and her family here. She loves all of the coffee beans selection, and her kid enjoys drawing on the sketch book in the corner and trying on the rocking chair. I ordered mocha berry latte, and the little boy had a chocolate muffin

Craft coffee and local crafts in a cozy coffee shop in The Haw. They've got beans on beans on beans. Light, dark and everything in between. The food selection is not as vast as the coffee but you're here to sip not to chew so order a latte and in one of the coziest coffee shops in The Haw.

Whenever me and my friends want to get away from commercial coffee place like Dunking and Starbucks, we come to Crossroads. It has the best atmosphere for early morning chats or working during the midafternoon. I love the decorations and wooded interior of this coffee shop. Crossroads captures the local experience in Waxhaw perfectly. It is refreshing to sit down, sip on a cup of coffee and enjoy the old town vibes. The coffee here is not overpriced for the quality of coffee you are getting. The coffee is a bit strong for my taste, and that is why I don't come often but for this exact reason the coffee shop attracts a lot of customers. Many like the authentic taste of coffee that is lost within chain companies. When you want to get away from working at home this shop is a great place to do work. Every time I come here there are people working on their computers, partaking in business calls and sitting in on meetings. Whether you live in the town of Waxhaw or you are just visiting the Crossroads Coffee House is a local gem that is the best way to start your morning in this town.

honestly this place has one of the best atmospheres in downtown Waxhaw. most of the staff are usually pretty kind and the coffee/sweets are priced fairly. the inconsistency of how the same drink tastes throughout the week really bothers me though. I'll go in on a Monday and order a mocha frost that's nice and sweet, then I'll go in on a Saturday and it'll taste bland and much less flavorful. overall I love this place, but the inconsistencies need to be addressed.
Really good coffee. Great place to sit and chat with family and friends.
great local coffee shop!
Been coming here for more than 20 years! Always a wonderful experience.

I love visiting this coffee shop whenever I'm in town from Ohio. Great coffee and perfect environment. But whoever was working today was not very customer friendly. She seemed more interested in carrying on her conversation with a friend/customer and I had to interrupt to get service. When I asked about the beans she seemed like I was inconveniencing her. Also, when I would ask a question the answer I got from her was "I don't know I haven't been here in four years." You don't answer a customer that way. If you don't know some thing you should say, "I'm not sure about that as I haven't been here in 4 years, but let me find out for you."
As her friend said, "there are other coffee shops around" and she's right. Next time I'm in town I'll go elsewhere!
They're really nice
good coffee, very cozy, and their beans slap
Retro coffee shop, good customer service and an amazing experience
Very good stuff

Nice old historical coffee shop tucked away in Waxhaw. Delicious coffee 
I'm local explorer feel free to follow me on ig @travelguidenc
Everything is delicious, wonderful quaint decor, excellent location, can't go wrong!!
Best Coffee! Top Notch - Lovin Livin in WAXHAW!!!

I bought my property from within this building (Homestead Land and Timber) in 1990.  Since, there've been a number of businesses here.  These fine folks will hopefully remain for many years, as they provide a nice and welcome niche in Waxhaw!  :)

Mike, I cannot remember what was on the lower level....too long ago!  Homestead was occupying at least part of the upper level, as best as I can recall.

I know it was before Robin White turned the lower level into a little deli that lasted a couple years.
Great coffee but expect a line!
I would have given more stars..they need too serve Danish, pastry variety too have with coffee.  Very limited. Good coffee and porch!
Absolutely love their coffee very polite and nice staff too by far the best coffee place I been too I would give it 10 stars if I could absolutely love it
Cute place for stop for a coffee or frozen drink.  They also lend their space to host AA and NA meetings.
Everything I visit, the bariatas are SO friendly. Love this little coffee joint
The coffee, roasted in-house, is top notch and prepared beautifully by the most pleasant baristas! A local favorite

Excellent coffee . I got the Brown Dog coffee grounded for my morning cup and it is amazing . Good recommendation. Will be my go to place for
Coffee
I love this spot! Coffee is on amazing, they are fairly priced, kid friendly atmosphere!

Long time customer.  Coffee is very good but I go because of the great staff.   Especially the longtime staff.  They remember me and what I get are friendly every time and always make me feel special.

This coffee house creates such a home environment with all of the nice baristas who you can always have a conversation with. They are always so sweet and make the best coffees. 10/10 I highly recommend their dirty chai.
Coffee wasn't good, had Americano maybe a different flavor or type would be better.
Can't get coffee in Waxhaw without stopping by!
Best Expresso Shakes in the world. Been coming here almost 20 years
Love their decaf!!! Friendly baristas cozy atmosphere
Glad to have this in Waxhaw!  A nice change from the traditional Starbucks and Dunkin.
I've come here countless times and the atmosphere along with the coffee is great! Definitely recommend trying
Very big selection of coffee. By the bag or cup. The cup I got was very good and nice and hot. This is a nice coffee house woth a downstairs and upstairs.
Love this place, perfect way to start your Waxhaw day.

I really love this place! The vibes are immaculate and I can easily spend hours at a time hanging out here whether I'm doing homework or catching up with friends or simply relaxing. Definitely recommend it for anyone who needs a pick me up in the morning or tourists that want a wholesome coffee shop to visit!
Best coffee and super cute shop!!
Excellent coffee.  Get place to meet and chat
Excellent!! ALWAYS has been; Always Will be!!
Very good tasting coffee!

Amazing selection of coffee beans. Both a light and a dark roast were available for immediate consumption. They must have every flavor of Torani coffee syrups available; I've not seen such a collection before. Very small dining area with well worn furnishings. I loved it. Excellent local alternative to national and regional chains
Nice place. Rustic atmosphere. Had a pretty good espresso milkshake.

This is a wonderful little local coffee shop. A true gem in the heart of Waxhaw. The staff is always very helpful and attentive. This is a great place to work quietly in a very calming environment. I have tried many of their coffee options and have loved everything. They also have local, handmade products such as jewelry, shirts and a few Christmas options this time of year. Treat yourself to a cup of coffee on the rocking chair front porch.
Great local coffee house. Staff is friendly. Just the right amount of pep to get you your coffee in the morning.

Was given the Nightmare before Christmas after asking for something the cashier would make themselves. Phenomenal coffee and the little drawing was a nice touch, highly highly recommend!!! Best coffee within 100 miles!!

It's a bit expensive for the quality. I bought a rhino coffee for 13$ per small package. The employees didn't help too much with medium roast choice, seemed they didn't know and it wasn't labeled on most of the products. I would not go back. And even the taste was not for 13$, sorry but I won't come back
Yum! Fantastic coffee, great price, friendly service!

Talk about the best coffee in town!  I drive 45 minutes sometimes to this coffee shop! The people that work there are amazing and always so nice ! You have to stop here if you haven't before ! You won't regret it !
Delicious laite, love the porch seating, good wifi so I could work, friendly staff. Highly recommended
Wish I lived closer. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Coffee is great.
Staff is always amazing and they have the coffee to match. I love coming here with friends. Gives the perfect waxhaw vibes.

Smells amazing when you first walk in! Finally a coffee shop that smells like coffee and oh my goodness on how many different roasts and beans they have! Great coffee too, I always get an Americano, but I was drowsy from lunch so I had a red-eye instead. It had good taste and was nice and hot. Wife got some speciality caramel drink, it was really good too

Definitely a very warm and friendly environment. Was my first time going today and I would recommend a few things such as; psycho puppy coffee, hazelnut crunch iced latte and the black and white cookie! Will be going back(:
Nice
Very original place . A lot of kind of coffee.
Cold brew is the best, always perfect. Great place to study and get work done.

This place is awesome. Great service and just wonderful people. If you're looking for a nice, quiet place to study, relax, hangout... then this is it.
As an EMT with Union County EMS the people working here ended up paying for my coffee today. Feeling so grateful right now.
Great place
The staff has always been patient with my crazy coffee order.
Adorable little coffee shop that roasts their own coffee. Always delicious and fresh!
ALWAYS!!

Place is awesome. Love the front porch. The Variety of coffee beans are great, especially the Brazilian.

The macchiato was perfect too!

Love crossroads. They have great drinks, a small yet quaint space, a moderate amount of outdoor seating, and great service. Try the espresso milkshakes! Perfectly located for enjoying downtown Waxhaw.
My favorite coffee shop in the area!!
Only if you are a real coffee drinker should you go to this place but I recommend it if you are coffees always fresh service is fantastic
My husband loves the Vanilla Bean Espresso milkshake! Handcrafted drinks and artisan items too! Cool jewelry and prints!
Very nice shop the staff is very friendly and respect enjoy going there coffee and cake and cookies or great
Friendly, small town charm. Yummy desserts, the smells here are heavenly. We had a latte and a smoothie. Both very good and different from usual coffee shops. Definitely returning!

I've been a customer here for at least 10 years. It's been a keystone of my Waxhaw experience. I respect the owners, and the staff.

I recommend them explicitly as "the" quality source of locally roasted coffee, not to mention consistent service and competitive value.

If you like exceptional coffee, pick up some of their premium roasts. Their Papua New Guinea, and "brown dog" blend are my favorites right now.
Excellent drinks and great service. Everyone (staff and customers) were following mask protocol. They also have a great selection of coffee beans for home brewing.
Very good nice people good coffee

I lived in Waxhaw for roughly 2 years and during that time Crossroads became my go-to place for anything from small meetings to grabbing something to drink for a long drive out of town. Their London Fog is my absolute favorite. I have since moved to another state but I make sure to drop by when I pass by the Charlotte area.
Great spot with lots of character in downtown Waxhaw to get coffee. Friendly staff and consistently good coffee drinks.
SHOP LOCAL! this place is great! super cute and wonderful atmosphere. the coffee is delicious!
Great coffee, it's almost habit forming.
Every brew has been top notch. Highly recommended

I can't stop coming here their tea is good their coffee is good their hot chocolate is amazing and honestly their staff is just so friendly and helpful I love the authentic feel of it and it just feels like home whenever I walk in.
The best
Love the atmosphere here, and the staff is extremely helpful and welcoming.
Great Coffee..friendly..no inside seating

This is an awesome coffee shop. I went here once when I was little, but forgot about it. But that changed very quickly when I decided to become a writer. I needed a quiet and chill place to think and get my ideas out. And this is the perfect place for it. Not to mention has great coffee,  and a staff that is very friendly. I don't feel like their creeped out whenever I come by or stressed, which is so nice. Overall, this place is a great spot to get away, and take a few breaths
Great stop on our bike trip, great coffee and friendly staff and residents

One of my favorite places in Waxhaw to visit! Great coffee, friendly service and a pure Waxhaw atmosphere.  I have been a customer since the opened  their doors. Started out as a teenager there, my friends and I would always walk to Jackson's Candy store, head onto Crossroads Coffee House and play cards there and have a great time.  Years have passed where I have been far away from the shop due to life changes, but I am looking forward to visiting again soon as I am moving nearby again  Looking forward to seeing ya'll again! This place will always hold good memories and the service always makes you come back for more hometown feelings. Thank ya'll for the many years of great brews and smiles!

CUUUUTEE! Delicious lattes too
I didn't know what to order but told them what I like, they made me something DELICIOUS and were super nice!
I love this place! It was my first time going today and the customer service was OUTSTANDING, I'm going to be going back just to chat with the girls. But the coffee was also sooo amazing!
The EPITOME of swag. Caring friendly workers, super cool and cozy shop, lots of delicious menu items. Go there. It is a must
I LOVE this place! Great coffee, atmosphere, and people!!

Excellent Coffee and Awesome Customer Service
I visited the shop a couple of weeks ago and loved the coffee so much that I wanted to purchase more, but was short on time, so I ordered it through their website and like a flash my 2 lbs. of coffee arrived the next day on my porch with a friendly text notification.  This was faster than Amazon and much better coffee.  I wasn't expecting it that fast and the coffee is worth waiting for but I was happily surprised and  I love the their Sumatra Dark.   I will be a returning customer and I highly recommend their coffee.

Quaint coffee shop with a small indoor seating area as well as outdoor seating. We always buy the toasted coconut coffee and it's the best flavored coffee I've ever tried.
Give the store a chance and you'll be just as hooked on their coffee as I am.

Wow! What a Great Coffee shop to visit!  Small but Personal, Friendly staff, Great choice of Coffee, hot, iced, cold brew, Tea, Sweet items. Coffee I had was So Delicious...Caramel, Chocolate, Hazelnut all into one cup, with espresso and steamed milk...you will love it...Java
Best coffee in Union County hands down, baristas are always friendly and give great suggestions.
The "vanilla grind" is almost as good as the excellent service.

Just moved to waxhaw, and I wanted this to have a wonderful first trip to our towns fav Coffee Shop, but instead I watched the Barista make a scene about my little kid not wearing a mask (making up new government rules), and on top of that she was  bad-mouthing another downtown business.  Very .  First and last trip EVER! Not to mention they sell CIGARS!! Don't talk about public health, and sell Cigars.  Long story short we went to Provisions, and had a wonderful experience.
They refused me service because of my asthma.  Also this response from the owner wasn't accurate.  Very sad they treat kids like this.
Great iced coffee and cold lemonade
Love this hidden gem!!
Friendly staff and great coffee.
Tasty coffee..thanks
Cool little coffee spot!!
Good coffee.

Great coffee house!  Their customer service is wonderful, the location is great, the character to the building is very unique, and their coffee and baked goods delicious!  I love the Blondies and their latte!  Plus they also have cigars too which pair up very nicely with their coffee!
Good coffee

Never been to Crossroads Coffee House or Waxhaw, NC for that matter untl this morning. Neat little place double espresso hit the spot. I should have bought a pound of espresso roast beans. Maybe next time. Highly recommended.
Good coffee and deserts.
Love it, and the people!!

1st time here very impressed how helpful the young lady was in helping me recommend a good tasting cup of coffee. The coffee was excellent and so good. If you are a coffee lover Crossroads Coffee is for YOU. Will definitely be coming back over and over.
Awesome atmosphere and service!
Very cute coffee shop with good drinks. Often busy upstairs, but otherwise is an excellent establishment
Cute little coffee place! Good variety.
Good coffee & friendly staff
Love this place, a cute coffee shop in Waxhaw.
great fresh ground coffee with large selection , & great cost.
Lived, laughed, loved
Warm, friendly staff and patrons and great coffee.
Awesome little place. Cozy atmosphere. Great coffee and baristas.

If you are sugar-free, they have more options than any other place I have been to. Their fruit smoothies are real fruit (frozen) and juice. The front porch is a great place to sit on a rocking chair and enjoy people watching.
Chai tea was excellent!
Definitely grab a coffee beverage from this place. you won't regret it!
Small but nice
Great place to have a great cup of coffee and chat.
Fun, local spot. Very easy to have a conversation. You never know who will be at the round table. I love the rotation of flavored coffee.
Good coffee...and cookies! Fun, funky place. Just happened in as I live out of town, but will definitely go back.
Nice place and great coffee too.
I love the decor inside this shop. Very cozy. The coffee is good and reasonably priced. The staff is accommodating enough. Not wow but okay.
Great place to get coffee and pastries in the morning.
Excellent java!
Wonderful place.  Employees are extremely friendly and engaging.  When I visit my "little sister" while in waxhaw we ALWAYS make a visit.
Great coffee and very friendly staff.

Great little coffee shop in downtown Waxhaw. Prices are where they need to be, and the coffee is fabulous. One drawback is lack of seating, and it could use some music. But, those small prices to pay for location, selection, and friendly conversation.
Best Beans in town. Love the owners! #classicwaxhawpeeps

I had the orange fantasia milkshake which was great on a hot day.  Outdoor fans would have made it even better, but it was still nice relaxing in the rocking chairs on the front porch because it's covered and you can watch all the passersby. Overall a nice laid back local spot. I'll be coming back again.
I love this place. It's old school and looks like an antique gift shop from back in the day.
FRESH Roasted coffee! Get it local!
Best coffee in NC

I've known of this place for a while but didn't check it out until I had a licensing exam to study for. This place is so NOT cookie cutter like your typical coffee house. It's rustic, old school, and real. The staff are all very friendly. The upstairs was PERFECT for studying. The coffee was good too. If you're looking for a Starbucks this ain't it, but if you're looking for a good cup of coffee, friendly staff, and an anything-but-cookiecutter setting right in downtown Waxhaw, this is your place.
Super cute coffee place
Great
Great atmosphere with awesome people and excellent coffee.
Fantastic coffee!
Nice place to sit, chat, work a bit with decent internet & coffee.  Coffee was good but not great.  However, service was very good.
Awesome coffee
Great coffee shop with relaxed chairs and nooks, hip music, and friendly service.  I love their Italian Dark Roast!!! I buy it by the pound and they grind it the way I ask.

This place is so great and has such a cozy, relaxed atmosphere! The staff is always so kind and happily answer any questions you have! Definitely my go to coffee place :) I wish there were more places like this!

I'm new in town so I was highly recommend by provisions restaurant to try the coffee at Crossroads.... I will admit the coffee was wonderful but the young lady behind the counter was very cold n not friendly at all ... I mean you will think of a unfamiliar face it's an opportunity to express how great your business is with a warm friendly hello and welcome , but that didn't happened.
I will come back if the next time am convinced.
Really delicious. The staff is very kind and loving. Cute atmosphere inside. Overall adorable coffee shop in old town.
Lovely baristas and great seating.  Free WiFi always helps too!
Great find...
Their coffee is soooo gooood.
Always good, eclectic, and novel choice of coffee and tea.
Best coffee ever! Mike is a mastermind roaster. Gloria Carter is the best barista on the face of this glorious green earth. You must try "The Gloria" shake!
Best coffee in Waxhaw
Good coffee
Great coffee house in the heart of historic downtown Waxhaw.
Amazing and yummy. Great atmosphere.
Long time patron. Staff and products are super. Love the smell of the coffee, and the smell of roasting beans throughout the town.
Good people and great coffee.
Always good coffee and the best milkshakes in town
Very friendly with wonderful staff and great selection.
Nice cozy place like cheers with coffee instead of beer
The coffee was amazing. Parking was good. Staff was friendly, helpful and knowledge. I would recommend Crossroads to everyone.
Great coffee and cool place.
Awesome thanks so much for the service.
Good destination for a motorcycle ride
Yes!!! A local coffee roaster loaded with fresh flavors. Ground, or Whole beans if you have a grinder at home.
They have great coffee. The Brazil is so good, it's amazingly sweet as a cold brew. Looking forward to trying it freshly brewed.
Great coffee, great baristas, best location. When I go home, I always visit. One of Waxhaw's finest gems.

I've been a patron of the place for years. I've always loved the atmosphere, the overall service, and of course the coffee.  Mr. Holiday has always done an immaculate job up keeping the place and Ariel always gives outstanding customer service. I will continue to visit the place well into the foreseeable future and would definitely recommend to anyone in the waxhaw area.
Great cold brew. Have Keto products and heavy cream lattes.  Friendly.  Will definitely be back.
I LOVE the coffee and the atmosphere here at Crossroads!
My neighboring store!
It's a Mist of you're in Downtown Waxhaw!
Nice place. Pretty Server

Like a feminine Prometheus serving the fire of the gods, the barista bestowed upon me a smooth and aromatic blend of distilled life. Wringing me back into this mortal coil, and electrifying my mind.
So, yeah the coffees good.
Love it
Amazing staff. Very friendly and professional. The coffee is great! Truly one of the best in the area. The coffee house itself just makes you feel at home. Great environment.
Great coffee great people. Always enjoy going their.
This is a great little spot to hangout and study and to sit and talk with friends! The service is always great and the drinks are really good!
Excellent coffee and reasonably priced. Highly recommend
Stopped in while passing through Waxhaw.  Quaint shop, good coffee, friendly staff, and the front porch is awesome.  We'll be back!
